am_aware: I am aware that I may:
live_chat_consent_intro:
I hereby give my consent to Parent that they may hand over my email address to Intercom located in the United States only if i need to use the in app chat function, where a server will [keep and store] my email address. This is necessary in order to use the support chat function.
In case i chose to use email or phone support Parent will not hand over my email address to Intercom located in the United States of America.

subsidies_settings_description: Add subsidy-related inputs manually; create algorithms for automatic calculation; manage multiple fund sources for children or separate individual funding requests and resources per child, and get a quick overview of pending, paid or sent invoices in the billing and transaction summary.

right_to_restrict_processing: Right to restrict processing: I have the right to object and to request restrictions on the processing of my personal data, which the controller performs.
right_to_data_portability: The right to data portability: I have the right to receive my information, which is handled by the person responsible at the time, in a machine-readable format.
right_to_be_deleted: Right to be deleted: I have the right to have my personal information deleted.
right_of_change: Right of change: I have the right to correct my personal data processed by the data processor.
right_of_access: Right of access: I have the right to gain insight to my personal information that the data controller processes.

institute_permissions_description: Create a request with a special permission. Submit requests to parents for approval on numerous certain actions with regard to their children. Permissions that are subject to approval along with the recipients can be looked upon here too.
institute_children_subtitle: Manage all children in your institute. Add new children, track current and upcoming enrolments, and keep records of withdrawn children. Manage each child’s contacts and add important information to the child’s profile. Click on the header name to sort the list by the child’s name, birthday, room, or start date.
holiday_feedback_overlapping: Another holiday already exists for some recipients. Do you like to proceed?
institute_class_subtitle: Create and easily manage rooms in your institute. Add classes, offices, kitchens, and other rooms that are in your institute.
notification_settings_description: Choose whether you want e-mail or push notifications
allow_private_messages: Allow other parents to message me privately
institute_staff_subtitle: Add staff members and control which features they can access. There are predefined roles that you can assign to your staff. These predefined roles are based on the most commonly used access provided by other institutions to their staff members.
closing_days_overlapping_confirmation: Weekends and existing closing days will be dismissed from the selected duration, proceed?
vacation_sick_validation: is already checked-in. Reporting sick or on vacation for today will automatically check them out. Would you like to proceed?
there_are_no_meals_for_this_institution: This setting has no registered meals
vacation_overlapping_confirmation_msg: This action will replace the sick/vacation status already registered for {{strNames}} within the selected period. Do you want to proceed?
hide_phone_number_other_contacts: Hide phone numbers from other contacts
checkin_institute_geo_information_error: Error occurred while getting geolocation of the Setting
location_out_of_range_error: Current location is out of the setting's geographic area
not_authorized_msg: You do not have permission to access this page
oops_no_signal_check_your_internet_conne: Oops no signal! check your internet connection
start_time_should_be_before_end_time: Start time should be before end time
upload_different_type: Uploading different types of attachment will clear the old attachments. Would you like to proceed?
name: Name
last_date_cannot_be_before_registration_: Last date cannot precede registration date
delete_confirmation_msg: Are you sure you want to delete this {{object}}?
you_cannot_set_an_activity_in_the_past: You cannot set an activity in the past.
you_cannot_set_an_event_in_the_past: You cannot set an event in the past.
checkin_will_remove_sick_vacation: Check-in will remove the sick/vacation that is already registered for {{strNames}} today. Would you like to proceed?
changing_holiday_days_reset_replies: Changing holiday days will reset all previous replies. Would you like to proceed?
you_cannot_set_new_holiday_in_the_past: You cannot choose a date in the past to register a new holiday
here_you_can_add_documents: Here you can add documents for the staff. The documents can not be seen by the parents
delete_folder_not_empty: This folder is not empty, Are you sure you want to delete this folder and its contents?
